document_data.name: ''Snicker-Snack''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Snicker-Snack''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[greatsword]] in the possession of [[Iggwilv]].
document_data.Description: It was gold with an ornate hilt and crossguard, purple surfaces on the blade, and a rose-like shape on the hilt.
document_data.Powers: This greatsword had a ''+3'' [[Item enchantment|enchantment]]. In addition, it carried the enchantment of a ''[[vorpal]]'' blade.
